mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chatbot_qa order by main_category desc
mapper.insert: insert into chatbot_qa (uid, main_category, sub_category, question_text, answer_text) values(#{uid},#{main_category}, #{sub_category}, #{question_text}, #{answer_text})
mapper.update: update chatbot_qa set main_category=#{main_category}, sub_category=#{sub_category}, question_text=#{question_text}, answer_text=#{answer_text}, category=#{category} where uid=#{uid}
